Title: Stag Mastery
Description:
I always was a fan of a good stag hunt. Stags are tough, fast, and territorial.

They may be plant eaters but they can give any hunter a run for his money.

East of here is a whole mess of Wilderland Stags just waiting for a hunter like yourself to give 'em a good run.

Happy hunting.
RewardText: I haven't seen stag hunting this good since Ashenvale.
